Hi! I'm Sérgio Félix,

Software Engineer.
header.description: Half a decade designing and developing innovative solutions with precision and creativity directly from Portugal.

about.title: About me
about.paragraph_1: Hey there! 👋 I'm Sérgio Félix, a junior software engineer who likes building creative digital experiences. ✨ I've always had a fascination with computers, but it wasn't until 2017, when I started a Professional Course in Management and Programming of Computer Systems, that I first dipped my toes into the world of programming.
about.paragraph_2: I enjoyed it, but only in 2020, when I dove into the Higher Professional Technical Course in Development for Web and Mobile Devices, that everything clicked. 😮 It was like opening a treasure chest full of new cool stuff rather than PHP, MySQL, and Bootstrap — only to realize there's a whole galaxy of tech out there! 🌌
about.paragraph_3: Right now, I'm completing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering and considering a Master's in Computer Science and Engineering in the future (maybe 🙃). I'm always on the lookout for new ways to flex my coding muscles and bring ideas to life whether through academic, personal, or professional projects.
about.paragraph_4: I continually pick up new skills and stay curious about solving new challenges. Whether it's in my sweet spot building a sleek web application or in my nightmare solving a tricky bug 💀, I'm all about delivering top-notch solutions that make an impact.
about.paragraph_5: So, if you're in need of an adaptable software engineer ready for new projects, let's connect! I'm eager to help turn your idea into reality. 😎
